so here was a man from a very simple
conservative village and he encountered
a problem when he realized that his wife
was using unhygenic rags now a normal
man's would probably say if I can't
afford sanitary pads let me you know
earn some more money so I could buy my
wife but Mergen anthem is a very
eccentric idiosyncratic character and he
decided why not just make a cheaper pad
in New York about Batman he devised a
contraption almost like an artificial
moon with a rubber bladder he filled
with pig's blood a pipe that led between
his legs and a pad and went cycling
around his pad still didn't work it
leaked so he had blood all over his
pants and what he tells me is that some
people even thought he was a vampire
secretly sucking blood from you know
animals and and women at night so he was
ostracized but he persevered and he did
manage to make this sanitary pad and to
invent the machine when I first began I
thought we'd make a small art house film
but I realized that the mission with
this movie is to have as many people
watch it for it to go across households
in India and globally as well and if you
know Indians see one of their idols
holding a sanitary pad in his hand then
half the taboos are completely dispelled
right at that moment
